overview:
Accomplished senior technology development and operations executive offering over 12 years of demonstrated career success developing and executing R&D strategies applied to cloud computing/distributed systems, promote product concept through product release, organizational growth and optimal utilization of emerging technologies in very high growth organizations.

• Currently building a new product for Amazon Web Services • One of the executives responsible for Limelight Networks, the second largest CDN in the world. • Extensive experience leading operations, Application Development and scaling organizations within diverse range of industries and with full P&L responsibility. • Possess in-depth experience with reporting, monitoring, mass scale architectures, competitive bidding and negotiation. • Decisive leader operational initiatives of organizations of varying size and scope. • Results-oriented professional, recognized for taking on major initiatives, adapting to rapidly changing environments and resolving mission critical issues to ensure bottom line success.

Specialties Complex technology products, new product creation, technical organization building, local and remote software development, distributed systems, scalable systems, architecture, caching, data analytics, streaming media, digital media, M&A activities
